headline: Why Bio-Techne (TECH) Shares Are Sliding Today
summary: Shares of life sciences company Bio-Techne (NASDAQ:TECH) fell 3.3% in the afternoon session after the major indices continued to retreat (Nasdaq -1.5%, S&P 500 -1.2%) amid profit-taking and renewed concerns about tariffs. The decline was not driven by company-specific news but rather widespread negative sentiment as investors returned from the Labor Day holiday. Major U.S. indexes, including the Dow Jones Industrial Average, S&P 500, and Nasdaq Composite, all tumbled. The downturn was fueled by
